sentences.en: Disease is an enemy of mankind.
Famine and war still afflict mankind.
sentences.cn: 饥饿和战争仍使人类遭受痛苦.

sentences.en: He has been devoting his whole life to benefiting mankind.
sentences.cn: 他把自己的一生贡献给了造福人类的事业.

sentences.en: He has devoted his whole life to benefiting mankind.
sentences.cn: 他为全人类的利益献出了自己的一生.

sentences.en: His research is for the betterment of mankind.
sentences.cn: 他的研究是为全人类造福。

sentences.en: Mankind has always struggled forward no matter what difficulty lies in its way.
sentences.cn: 不管道路上有什么困难,人类总是要奋勇前进.

sentences.en: Mankind's knowledge of the universe has increased beyond measure.
sentences.cn: 人类对于宇宙的了解已经大为增加。

sentences.en: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.cn: 人类历史上最重要的事件之一

sentences.en: Since earliest times, mankind has been fascinated by fire.
sentences.cn: 人类自远古以来就对火很感兴趣。

sentences.en: The Chinese people should make a greater contribution to mankind.
sentences.cn: 中国人应当对人类有较大的贡献.

sentences.en: The history of mankind is the history of ideas.
sentences.cn: 人类的历史就是思想的历史。

sentences.en: The new discovery is bound to be of great service to mankind.
sentences.cn: 这项新发现对于人类必定大有用处.

sentences.en: They laboured for the happiness of mankind.
sentences.cn: 他们为人类的幸福而努力工作.

sentences.en: When will the desert give up its secrets to mankind?
sentences.cn: 沙漠何时才会向人类显露它的秘密 呢 ?

trans.tran_en: all humans considered as a group
